string-array.name: dwl_fourth
string-array.item: one car garage attached to the dwelling
two car garage attached to the dwelling
Two car garage is detached from the dwelling.

string-array.name: dmg_interior_damage
string-array.item: No Interior damage reported - Inspection of interior declined.
Water damage to the ceilings in several rooms. Repairs are included in the attached estimate.
Interior drywall damage on the ceilings in several rooms. Minor drywall work and painting required for repairs, and is included in estimate.

Water damage in the basement from the sewer back up damaged the paneling on the walls in the main basement. The floor needs to be cleaned in the Utility room. There are contents that were affected. [INSURED NAME] will go through the contents and discus with Inside rep. The interior repairs may not be covered damage on this claim, but an estimate for repairs has been included for review by inside rep and as a tool to help [INSURED NAME] to get the repairs completed.

string-array.name: dmg_roof
string-array.item: No storm related damage found during inspection of Roof
ROOF HAS SUSTAINED WIND DAMAGE IN MANY LOCATIONS AND HAS A LARGE NUMBER OF MISSING, BROKEN, AND DAMAGED SHINGLES. THEREFORE REPAIR IS NOT AN OPTION AND FULL ROOF REPLACEMENT IS ESTIMATED FOR.

Hail Damage of 8 hits per sq present on all slopes. Based on the age and condition of the materials, and the amount of damage, repair is not an option and full replacement has been included in the attached estimate.
No Damage found on the shingles, the soft metal roof vents have Hail Damage damage present. The repairs include replacing the vents and allowing 3 shingles per vent to make the repairs.

string-array.name: dmg_elevation
string-array.item: No storm related damage found to this elevation, No repairs recommended.

string-array.name: dmg_notes
string-array.item: NONE TO ADD TO THE FILE AT THIS TIME.
